content: and you re done abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 together p2tog purl 2 together ssk slip slip knit slip two stiches knitwise place back on the left hand needle and knit together ssk slip slip slip knit slip three stiches knitwise place back on the left hand needle and knit together k3tog knit 3 together sl 1-k2tog-psso slip one stitch knitwise knit two stiches together pass the slipped stitch over the k2tog three stiches are reduced into one k2wp pick up wrap s and place on left needle k2tog knitting the wrap and it s stitch together process the same picking up all wraps and knitting them and their stitch together into one stitch whether there is one wrap or two p2wp pick up wrap s and place on left needle p2tog purling the wrap and it s stitch together process the same picking up all wraps and purling them and their stitch together into one stitch whether there is one wrap or two
